ing: 4 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and sliced
des: "I have a very basic recipe to add some sweetness to breakfast or any meal. Serve garnished with additional cinnamon if desired."
ins: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; stir sugar and cinnamon into the hot butter. Add apples and cook until apples begin to break down, 5 to 8 minutes.
